page.title: 18MARTON MERE CARAVAN PARK
page.content: {Marton Mere Caravan Park}lies some two and a half miles from the centre of Blackpool.It covers an area of 93 acres and is one of the major caravan sites in the area. It derives its name from{Marton Mere which lies close by.Originally this was a very large expanse of water which covered a considerable area of the lower-lying land in this part of the Fylde.Most of the flooded area was drained and reclaimed during the 19th.and early 20th.centuries although there is still quite a large expanse of water.It is now the permanent and temporary home for many different birds and other wildlife. The caravan park has many facilities both for the static caravans and the many touring caravans that visit the area in the summer months. All the main facilities are provided there.
